name: Kirchhoff's Revenge
description: Kirchhoff is annoyed because nobody appreciates his circuit laws! You get transported to his secret lair and won't be able to get out until you show mastery!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM
